law.text: A state fund is hereby authorized, called "The Kentucky State Public Employees Deferred Compensation Trust Fund," which shall consist of all of the assets of the system as set forth in KRS 18A.230 to 18A.275. No part of this fund shall revert to the general fund of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 181, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2008. -- Repealed, reenacted, and amended as KRS 18A.240, 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 448, sec. 48, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 143, sec. 4.
